entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovableEntity, StationaryEntity

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that is the super for all entities. This class includes functionality shared by all other entities
    Author:
    Nick Lauder
